# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

This repository uses/tests with the latest version of:

- Go (min v1.21.1)
- Golang-CI Lint (min v1.56.2)
- Docker (min v25.0.3)
- Docker Compose (min v2.24.6)
- Nginx (min v1.25.4)

## Reporting a Vulnerability
